name: Waffle with Berries
description: A delightful waffle topped with fresh berries, combining the sweetness of the fruit with the crisp, golden base. Perfect for breakfast or a light dessert, this waffle brings together the juicy flavors of ripe berries and the warm, comforting taste of a freshly made waffle.

name: Vanilla Bean Crème Brûlée
description: A luxurious dessert featuring creamy vanilla bean custard with a perfectly caramelized sugar crust. Its rich and velvety texture is beautifully balanced by the crisp, caramelized top, making it an irresistible treat for special occasions or indulgent evenings.

name: Macaron Mix of Five
description: An exquisite assortment of five macarons, each bursting with unique flavors and vibrant colors. These delicate and colorful treats offer a symphony of textures and tastes, from their crisp shells to their creamy, flavorful fillings.

name: Classic Tiramisu
description: A timeless Italian dessert with layers of espresso-soaked ladyfingers and rich mascarpone cream. This classic treat is finished with a dusting of cocoa powder, offering a harmonious blend of coffee and creamy sweetness in every bite.

name: Pistachio Baklava
description: A sweet and flaky pastry layered with finely chopped pistachios and drizzled with honey syrup. This Middle Eastern delicacy is a perfect combination of crunchy and sweet, delivering an indulgent experience with every bite.

name: Lemon Meringue Pie
description: A tangy lemon custard pie topped with fluffy, toasted meringue for a perfect balance of flavors. Its bright citrusy notes contrast beautifully with the sweetness of the meringue, creating a delightful dessert that’s both refreshing and indulgent.

name: Red Velvet Cake
description: A rich and velvety red cake layered with smooth cream cheese frosting for a classic treat. Each slice offers a beautiful balance of sweetness and tanginess, making it a perfect choice for celebrations or everyday indulgence.

name: Salted Caramel Brownie
description: A decadent brownie infused with gooey salted caramel for the ultimate sweet and savory indulgence. The rich chocolate base is complemented perfectly by the luscious caramel swirls, making it an irresistible choice for chocolate lovers.

name: Vanilla Panna Cotta
description: A silky smooth panna cotta infused with vanilla and served with a delightful fruit compote. This elegant dessert melts in your mouth, offering a perfect harmony of creamy texture and fruity sweetness.
